file_complaint_police_service.title: File Complaint with Police Service
file_complaint_police_service.description: File complaint with the municipal police service (Regina, Saskatoon) or RCMP detachment.

serious_incident_response_team.title: Saskatchewan Serious Incident Response Team (SIRT)
serious_incident_response_team.description: SIRT investigates serious incidents involving police including death, serious injury, sexual assault, or domestic violence.
serious_incident_response_team.timeframe: Immediate - automatically notified but you can also report

public_complaints_commission.title: Saskatchewan Public Complaints Commission
public_complaints_commission.description: Independent review of complaints about municipal police conduct if unsatisfied with internal investigation.
public_complaints_commission.timeframe: Within 30 days of receiving police decision

contactInfo.address: Public Complaints Commission, 1874 Scarth Street, 5th Floor, Regina, SK S4P 4B3

understanding_child_protection.title: Understanding Saskatchewan Child Protection
understanding_child_protection.description: Ministry of Social Services oversees child protection through local offices.

internal_complaint.title: File Internal Complaint
internal_complaint.description: File complaint with your local Ministry of Social Services office.

children_advocate.title: Saskatchewan Advocate for Children and Youth
children_advocate.description: Independent advocate that can review and investigate child welfare concerns.
children_advocate.timeframe: After internal complaint or immediately if urgent

ombudsman.title: Saskatchewan Ombudsman
ombudsman.description: Investigates complaints about provincial government departments including Social Services.
